stripped_text: If Intake is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Intake, trace 4 If successful, add an installed program or virtual resource to the grip. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Intake from Archives.
text: If Intake is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Intake, trace 4 If successful, add an installed program or virtual resource to the grip. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Intake from Archives.
title: Intake
